name: Request
description: This category allows to match on properties of HTTP request such as schema, method, headers and originating client IP address.

name: Variable
description: This category allows to match on any HTTP variable available in Sailfish, but not directly supported in the UI (i.e. this is our universal catch-all match)

name: Device
description: This category allows to match on mobile device properties and identify capabilities such as brand name, OS version, resolution, etc.

name: Location
description: This category allows to match on geographical location of originating client such as continent, country, city, etc.

name: Server
description: This category allows to match on properties of CDN server such as POP code.

name: URL
description: This category allows to match on URL elements such as path and query string.

name: Origin
description: This category allows to match on Customer or CDN Origin server.
